participant_1.background:
I love to visit websites about dogs and the rain.
i regularly go to the gym.
I haven't been in a fight, but I've been in situations where I felt threatened because of my sexuality.
i love to fish.
my favorite band is pink floyd.

participant_2.background:
I am a young woman who loves to ride my bike and spend time with my pets.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
I enjoy playing tennis with my mother, and it is a great way for us to stay fit.
I enjoy playing with my cat Seven of Nine.

content.text: Hey, I'm just hanging out. How are you doing?
I'm doing great, thank you for asking! I'm just getting ready to go for a bike ride. How about you?
Oh that sounds lovely! I'm just about to head to the gym for a work out. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy playing with my cat, Seven of Nine, and taking pictures of the city. What do you do for fun?
I love to go fishing and play video games. I also really enjoy spending time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like great ways to pass the time. I'm glad you have a lot of things that you enjoy doing.
Thank you! I try to keep myself busy. I have to ask, what kind of bakery do you manage?
It's a small bakery that specializes in homemade breads and pastries. We also do a lot of custom orders for events.
That sounds amazing! I love homemade bread. I'm sure your bakery is very popular.
It is! We're always busy, but it's a lot of fun.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying what you do.
Thank you! I hope you have a great day at the gym!
Thank you! I'm sure I will.
